original: blo ni blo gros so //
analyzed: blo ni blo gros so //

original: chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig nyid do //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig nyid do //

analyzed: des na padma so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis brjod bya rjod byed du brtags pa mthar byas pa'o //

analyzed: lan la mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams yin te 'gal ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: gsungs pa / rang bzhin gyi dngos so //

analyzed: rdo rje kun ni rnam par rtog pa rnams te 'di ni dam tshig go //

analyzed: bgegs ni rnam par rtog pa tsam @159b la rag las pa'i phyir ro //

original: da ni ji skad du bshad pa'i gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams dris pa'i ched du brjod pa gsungs pa mi 'jigs pa ni gshin rje gshed do //

translated: Now, in order to ask about the four, such as YamƒÅntaka, as they have been explained, the expression of the question is stated: ‚ÄúFearlessness is YamƒÅntaka.‚Äù

original: brjod du med pa ni rta mgrin no //
analyzed: brjod du med pa ni rta mgrin no //

analyzed: rtog pa bral ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //

analyzed: de ni rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni ye shes so //

analyzed: 'di shes pas bde ba mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gti mug ni mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni gti mug chen po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas pa nye bar longs spyod pa'o //

analyzed: des gti mug zad pa ni gti mug gi zad pa ste / rnam par snang mdzad de yang gshin rje mthar byed do //
translated: The exhaustion of delusion is the exhaustion of delusion.üîΩAnd that Vairochana is Yamantaka.

analyzed: phung po mthar byed pa ni phung po'i bdud mthar byed pa'o //

original: des shes bya ste /
analyzed: des shes bya ste /

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa yang mthar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa yang mthar byed par 'gyur ro //

original: shes rab mthar byed do //
analyzed: shes rab mthar byed do //

original: des na bsags pa'i don gyis na sems te mthar byed pa'o //
analyzed: des na bsags pa'i don gyis na sems te mthar byed pa'o //

original: nyon mongs pa ni bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang de nyid kyis mthar byas pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang de nyid kyis mthar byas pa'o //
translated: The afflictions and the obscuration of afflictions are also terminated by that.

original: 'dod chags ni nyon mongs pa ste 'dod chags de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ni 'od dpag tu med pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni nyon mongs pa ste 'dod chags de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ni 'od dpag tu med pa nyid kyis so //

analyzed: 'dod chags zad pa'i rnam par dag pa ni padma mthar byed do //

original: des ni tshig mthar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni tshig mthar byed par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid mthar byas pa'i rnam par dag pa rdzogs par byed pa'o //

analyzed: 'chi bdag gi bdud dang skye ba'i sgrib pa yang mthar byas par 'gyur bar blta bar bya'o //

original: nyon mongs pa kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams so //

original: rdo rje thams cad ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i phung po rnams so //üîΩsgrib pa kun ni shes bya la sogs pa rnams te shes pa de la zad @160a * //

original: pa ni bgegs rnams mthar byas pa'o //
analyzed: pa ni bgegs rnams mthar byas pa'o //

translated: The five such as earth are the five aspects, and the nature of the purification of earth and so forth, LocanƒÅ and so forth, along with the space that has become the pure source of phenomena, are the five elements, explained as the goddesses.

analyzed: da ni // kun du spyod pa gang zhig lags //

original: zhes pa ni dris pa yin te /
